faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 285 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros for one slice of cheese pizza?
faqs.a: About 36 g carbs, 12 g protein, 10 g fat.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has around 640 mg sodium from cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~40 kcal per slice; deep-dish adds ~50-100 kcal.
